snippet: The average ticket price on the secondary market was said to be the lowest for a wild-card play-in game since the concept was introduced in 2012.
abstract: New York Yankees officials say Yankee Stadium is essentially sold out for upcoming wild-card game against Houston Astros, though ticket prices on secondary market are lowest in wild-card-game history.
lead_paragraph: The average ticket price on the secondary market was said to be the lowest for a wild-card play-in game since the concept was introduced in 2012.

headline.main: Playoff Game in the Bronx Nears Sellout; Resales Lag
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Wild-Card Game Nears Sellout as Resales Lag
